mapper.insert: insert into sys_role (role_id, role_name, remark, create_user_id, create_time) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select * from sys_role order by role_id asc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
